name: 魔法考核冒险
description:
Story background:

The Magicians Association is a professional organization for all magicians, recognized by the vast majority of people from the world.
Every magician registered in the association will have a magician level certified by the association, starting from [Level 1], a total of five levels. To upgrade the magician level, you need to participate in the assessment prepared by the association.

Today is the day of [Tier 3] Magician—Yiyou, participating in the [Tier 4] assessment. Different from the previous few times, the [Level 4] assessments are all personal assessments. Whether Yiyou can pass this assessment, she herself is a little uneasy.


Gameplay:

The puzzle-solving game contains elements such as calculation, avoidance, and mechanism. The key to solving puzzles lies in the control of information.
The player will operate Yiyou and participate in this assessment with her.
There are many levels in the assessment, and the final score is determined according to the degree of passing each level. There are three endings.
